metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3049 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in SplitScreen in Google Chrome on Chrome OS, Lacros priorto 105.0.5195.52 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engagein specific UI interactions to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
